EmailTemplate.subject: Join us for champagne and pampering.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Perrier-Jouët invites you to join us at an exclusive La Prairie pampering session tomorrow Friday the 11th March from 7 PM - 9 PM. Discover the iconic Skin Caviar Collection and learn the latest beauty secrets from La Prairie’s own skin care experts. Be one of the first to experience La Prairie’s latest gilded pleasure - Cellular Radiance Perfecting Fluide Pure Gold. We will treat you to a Perrier-Jouët Champagne tasting and you’ll be walking home with a complimentary La Prairie gift worth more than $100. We have limited seats for this exclusive event so secure your attendance today. We look forward to welcome you at the the Heeren on Orchard Road for some exclusive pampering. Your Sincerely,
